mapper.select: SELECT id, category, title, limit_people as limitPeople, limit_price as limitPrice, owner_id as ownerId, member_id as memberId, is_open as isOpen, created_at as createdAt, finished_at as finishedAt FROM party WHERE category = #{category} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO party ( title, finished_at, limit_people, limit_price, owner_id, is_open, category ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{finishedAt}, #{limitPeople}, #{limitPrice}, #{ownerId}, #{isOpen}, #{category} )
